snippet: A British court upheld an order that Ryanair sell most of its stake in Aer Lingus, agreeing with regulators’ earlier findings.
abstract: British court upholds order that Ryanair sell most of its stake in Aer Lingus, agreeing with regulators’ earlier findings that holding gives low-cost carrier too much influence over its Irish rival.
lead_paragraph: A British court upheld an order that Ryanair sell most of its stake in Aer Lingus, agreeing with regulators’ earlier findings.

headline.print_headline: Court Upholds Regulators’ Ruling Against Ryanair
